thread.title: BRIEF-PSE&G Reaches Agreement With NJ BPU Staff And Rate Counsel On Next Phase Of Gas Infrastructure Replacement

title: BRIEF-PSE&G Reaches Agreement With NJ BPU Staff And Rate Counsel On Next Phase Of Gas Infrastructure Replacement
text:
Market News  40 AM / Updated 9 minutes ago BRIEF-PSE&G Reaches Agreement With NJ BPU Staff And Rate Counsel On Next Phase Of Gas Infrastructure Replacement Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 23 (Reuters) - Public Service Enterprise Group Inc : 
* PSE&G REACHES AGREEMENT WITH NJ BPU STAFF AND RATE COUNSEL ON NEXT PHASE OF GAS INFRASTRUCTURE REPLACEMENT 
* PUBLIC SERVICE ELECTRIC AND GAS - $1.875 BILLION SETTLEMENT WITH STAFF OF NEW JERSEY BPU, NEW JERSEY DIVISION OF RATE COUNSEL, OTHER PARTIES 
* PUBLIC SERVICE ELECTRIC AND GAS - SETTLEMENT TO CONTINUE ACCELERATED REPLACEMENT OF AGING GAS PIPES 
* PUBLIC SERVICE ELECTRIC AND GAS - SETTLEMENT AGREEMENT IS PENDING APPROVAL BY BPU 
* PUBLIC SERVICE ELECTRIC AND GAS - CO’S ROE ON INVESTMENT TO BE DETERMINED AS PART OF UTILITY’S BASE DISTRIBUTION RATE REVIEW CURRENTLY UNDER WAY 
* PUBLIC SERVICE ELECTRIC AND GAS - SETTLEMENT ENABLES UTILITY TO REPLACE 875 MILES OF GAS MAINS OVER 5-YEAR PERIOD Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
